required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: SIMBRINZA® Suspension BID as an Adjunctive to Prostaglandin Analogue (PGA)
clinical_study.official_title: Additive Effect of Twice Daily Brinzolamide 1%/Brimonidine 0.2% Fixed Dose Combination as an Adjunctive Therapy to a Prostaglandin Analogue

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the additive intraocular pressure (IOP) lowering effect of brinzolamide 1%/brimonidine 0.2% (dosed twice per day (BID)) when added to a PGA in patients with open-angle glaucoma or ocular hypertension.

detailed_description.textblock: This study consists of 2 sequential phases: Screening/Eligibility Phase, which includes a Run-in/Washout (Phase I), and Masked Treatment Phase (Phase II). At the Screening Visit, subjects will be assigned into one of 3 PGA therapy groups for the duration of the study. Subjects previously prescribed TRAVATAN®, XALATAN®, or LUMIGAN® monotherapy with uncontrolled IOP will not need a run-in period with PGA.

primary_outcome.measure: Mean change from baseline in diurnal IOP at Week 6
primary_outcome.description: IOP averaged over the 09:00 and 11:00 time points.

secondary_outcome.description: IOP averaged over the 09:00 and 11:00 time points.

secondary_outcome.measure: Mean percentage change from baseline in diurnal IOP at Week 6
secondary_outcome.description: IOP averaged over the 09:00 and 11:00 time points.

secondary_outcome.measure: Mean change from baseline in IOP for each time point (09:00, 11:00) at Week 6
Mean percentage change from baseline in IOP for each time point (09:00, 11:00) at Week 6

arm_group.description: Brinzolamide 1%/brimonidine 0.2% tartrate ophthalmic suspension, 1 drop instilled 2 times per day in affected eye(s) (09:00 and 21:00) plus designated prostaglandin analogue, 1 drop instilled in each eye once per day in the evening for 42 days
Brinz/brim vehicle, 1 drop instilled 2 times per day in affected eye(s) (09:00 and 21:00) plus designated prostaglandin analogue, 1 drop instilled in each eye once per day in the evening for 42 days

intervention.description: Inactive ingredients used as a placebo for masking purposes

intervention.other_name: TRAVATAN® PQ (Travoprost ophthalmic solution with PQ, 0.004%)
